trans-unit.source: All volumes to snapshot must be stored on NTFS file systems.

seg-source.mrk: All volumes to snapshot must be stored on NTFS file systems.

target.mrk: Tous les volumes cibles doivent être stockés sur des systèmes de fichiers NTFS.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the snapshot revert feature, do not install any ADE components on the system disk.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to use the snapshot revert feature, do not install any ADE components on the system disk.

target.mrk: Si vous souhaitez utiliser la fonctionnalité de restauration d'un snapshot, n'installez aucun composant ADE sur le disque système.

trans-unit.source: Administrators must be familiar with Windows snapshot procedures.

seg-source.mrk: Administrators must be familiar with Windows snapshot procedures.

target.mrk: Les administrateurs doivent être familiarisés avec les processus de snapshot Windows.

trans-unit.source: All volumes must be stored on version 2.02.95 or higher of LVM2.

seg-source.mrk: All volumes must be stored on version 2.02.95 or higher of LVM2.

target.mrk: Tous les volumes doivent être stockés sur une version 2.02.95 ou supérieure de LVM2.

trans-unit.source: All volumes used by ADE must be Thin Provisioned LVM volumes (thin volumes). See <MadCap:xref href="Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:appendix_thin_volume_2250391909_83487" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creation of a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref><MadCap:xref href="import-link:hss_appendix_thin_volume_750585405_42813" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:hss_appendix_thin_volume_750585405_42813" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">.</MadCap:xref>

seg-source.mrk: All volumes used by ADE must be Thin Provisioned LVM volumes (thin volumes).

See <MadCap:xref href="Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:appendix_thin_volume_2250391909_83487" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creation of a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref><MadCap:xref href="import-link:hss_appendix_thin_volume_750585405_42813" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:hss_appendix_thin_volume_750585405_42813" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">.</MadCap:xref>

target.mrk: Tous les volumes utilisés par ADE doivent être des volumes logiques à allocation fine (Thin Provisioned LVM ou thin volumes).

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Create_Thin_Volume_Linux.htm" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:appendix_thin_volume_2250391909_83487" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creation of a Thin Volume on Linux</MadCap:xref><MadCap:xref href="import-link:hss_appendix_thin_volume_750585405_42813" MadCap:unresolvedLink="import-link:hss_appendix_thin_volume_750585405_42813" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">.</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Administrators must be familiar with Linux snapshot procedures.

seg-source.mrk: Administrators must be familiar with Linux snapshot procedures.

target.mrk: Les administrateurs doivent être familiarisés avec les processus de snapshot Linux.
